page.title: 18HAMSEY GREEN SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: { Hamsey Green - a local shopping { centre.} One of the largest shopping parades is Hamsey Green which consists of about twenty-five shops, including a branch of Interflora. The most popular shops used were the post office, the Co-op, Woolworths and the bakery. Most people visited only if they ran out of anything. Some people travelled up to 5 KM to reach Hamsey Green. Most people walk there. No-one in our survey used the 403 bus. Customers who go to Browns the Bakers in Hamsey Green live in a local area of about 3 KM. The shop is quite small and could get quite crowded on a Saturday. Overall, the Hamsey Green shops are well situated, although there is room for improvement, like more specialist shops and a better bus service.
